borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a new dormer window, and repositioning of an existing dormer window to the rear elevation at second floor level; re-sizing and replacement of an existing window, to the rear elevation at first floor level; installation of new glazed doors following the removal of existing French doors and windows, and repositioning of existing balustrade to the rear elevation at upper ground floor level; bricking up an existing window to the rear elevation at lower ground floor level; alterations to the existing single storey rear conservatory extension to include, formation of a flat roof on top following the removal of existing glazed sloped roof in connection with the enlargement of existing roof terrace at upper ground floor level, and installation of new glazed doors following the removal of existing to the rear elevation; alterations to the existing external staircase to include, re-sizing and replacement, installation of new glass railings to the rear elevation from upper ground to lower ground floor level, and installation of a new timber door to the side elevation under the staircase.
